title: Agent Hub Granular Service Control and Observability

comment:

STRUCTURE VERIFICATION (SOP-002 Section 6):
All 12 mandatory sections present: Purpose (S1), Scope (S2), Current State (S3), Proposed State (S4), Change Description (S5), Justification (S6), Impact Assessment (S7), Testing Summary (S8), Implementation Plan (S9), Execution (S10), Execution Summary (S11), References (S12). Scope includes Context, Changes Summary, and Files Affected per Section 6.2.

PLACEHOLDER CONTENT: No TBD, TODO, FIXME, or XXX found. Execution table editable field templates ([SUMMARY], [Pass/Fail], [PERFORMER], [DATE]) are conforming per SOP-004 Section 5 -- these are blank at pre-review stage.

EXECUTION TABLE: 12 EIs. EI-1 is pre-execution commit, EI-12 is post-execution commit, conforming to SOP-004 Section 5.

Implementation plan correctly sequences RTM approval (EI-10) before merge (EI-11), respecting SOP-005 Section 7.1.3 merge gate and SOP-006 Section 7.4.

TESTING SUMMARY: Addresses both automated verification (416 tests, CI) and integration verification (8 specific scenarios) per SOP-002 Section 6.8.

TRACEABILITY: References SOP-001, SOP-002, SOP-004, SOP-005, SOP-006, and code review findings H1/L1/L8/L9 with session ID.

TU ASSIGNMENT: No TUs assigned. All affected files are infrastructure (agent-hub, qms-cli MCP, Docker) -- none fall within Flow State domains (UI, Scene, Sketch, Simulation). No TU has relevant domain expertise.

FORMATTING/TYPOS: Consistent heading levels, table formatting, and horizontal rules throughout. No spelling or grammatical errors found.

COMPLIANCE: All review criteria satisfied. Document is compliant with SOP-001, SOP-002, SOP-004, SOP-005, and SOP-006.
